s_synopsis: Bicycle Kicks. Headers. Slides. Dives. Tackles. This Is Soccer The Way Pele Plays It. Pelé! soccer is the ultimate battle for international soccer supremacy from the sport's most celebrated star. Who's got what it takes to finish on top? South America? Europe? The U.S.? With 40 international clubs to choose from, there's only one way to find out. Pele's way.
